@graph.name: Where is Roomi available? | Roomi | blog
Roomi | blog
@graph.description: Rent rooms and find roommates in our verified community

jetpack-related-posts.title: Places To Live In NYC With Your Foodie Roommate!
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Everyone loves food, but you and your roommate take that appreciation to a whole new level. 'Foodie roommate' is the first definition of your relationship, and there's no other way around it. Both of you perk up at the word “samples,” and have been known to accept restaurant gift cards…

img.alt_text: all the places you could live in NYC with your foodie roommate!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Best Value Neighborhood Review: Astoria
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Astoria neighborhood has tons to offer for the price. At first glance, it might seem like a quiet, middle class neighborhood. And while that’s part of Astoria’s awesome personality, don’t let it fool you into thinking this place is boring. Delicious microbreweries, astounding Greek food, beautiful parks, and more…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi vs Aya: Which is the Best Portal to Find Rooms for Rent?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Whether you're a broke college student or a young professional, there's a lot of factors to consider when moving to a new place. You could have financial restrictions in place, or just some personal preferences in mind. Either way, you're gonna want to find the perfect room that has everything…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Introducing More Genders on Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.author: Alex Larsen
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Roomi is for everyone ❤️ Roomi helps humans across the world find roommates that get them. We're committed to making your housing search easy, safe and welcoming. This is why we’re expanding our gender options to include “Non-Binary” to better reflect the community we serve. Our intention is to create…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi vs Livewith: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: There are many things to consider when moving to a new city, and one of them is housing and roommates. Thanks to today's technology, plenty of roommate finder apps and websites are available to use. However, they are not all reliable. As much as Craiglist is a popular choice for…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi vs Roomgo: Which is the Best Portal to Find Rooms for Rent?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: No one likes moving, but it’s especially sucky when you’re moving to a completely new city. When you don’t have any relatives or friends in new city, it can be challenging to find rooms for rent. Are you on the hunt for the best room finder out there? Don’t worry,…
